name: Cheeseburger🍔
description: Local grass-fed beef grilled to perfection with fresh Monterey Jack cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and sourdough buns.

name: Club Sandwich🥪
description: Finely sliced turkey and bacon, lettuce, tomatoes, and mayonaise topped on freshly baked sourdough bread.

name: Fish & Chips🐟
description: Fresh cod imported from Scandinavia, deep fried and lightly seasoned with a side of our homemade fries and your choice of dip.

name: Homemade Fries🍟
description: Local grown potatoes fried till golden brown and lightly seasoned with salt.

name: Kale Salad🥗
description: Made with fresh, hearty kale, Parmesan cheese, toasted almonds, dried cranberries, and a fresh lemon balsamic dressing.

name: Freshly Baked Cookies🍪
description: New cookies made weekly! This week's cookie is blueberry muffin, made with vanilla cookie base marbled with blueberry jam, loaded up with blueberries and finally topped with a crunchy streusel topping.
